SQL_STMT_U.val: select MAX(BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT) from :1/BADT where BADT_BANK_ADMNO=:2 AND BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO=:3 AND BADT_BANKID=:4 AND BADT_BANKACCOUNT=':5' AND BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT<':6'
select MIN(BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT) from :1/BADT where BADT_BANK_ADMNO=:2 AND BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO=:3 AND BADT_BANKID=:4 AND BADT_BANKACCOUNT=':5'
select MIN(BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT) from :1/BADT where BADT_BANK_ADMNO=:2 AND BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO=:3 AND BADT_BANKID=:4 AND BADT_BANKACCOUNT=':5' AND BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT>':6'
select MAX(BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT) from :1/BADT where BADT_BANK_ADMNO=:2 AND BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO=:3 AND BADT_BANKID=:4 AND BADT_BANKACCOUNT=':5'
select COUNT(*) AS N from :1/BADT where BADT_BANK_ADMNO=:2 AND BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO=:3 AND BADT_BANKID=:4 AND BADT_BANKACCOUNT=':5' AND BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT=':6'
select MAX(BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT) from :1/BADT where BADT_BANK_ADMNO=:2 AND BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO=:3 AND BADT_BANKID=:4 AND BADT_BANKACCOUNT=':5' AND BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER=1
